5432.name: Unknown
5432.message:
An error has occurred.
Please try again later.
If the problem persists, please
make a note of the error code and
visit support.nintendo.com.
5432.short_solution: Switch to Nintendo Network with Nimbus, attempt to connect to a Nintendo service such as the eShop, then switch back to Pretendo and try again.
5432.long_solution: Switch to Nintendo Network with Nimbus, attempt to connect to a Nintendo service such as the eShop, then switch back to Pretendo and try again.
